alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Musselshell; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 11:44PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...STRONG SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT STILLWATER...EASTERN WHEATLAND... NORTHWESTERN MUSSELSHELL...GOLDEN VALLEY...SWEET GRASS AND SOUTH CENTRAL PARK COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM MDT... At 1140 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles south of Moore to 20 miles northeast of Big Timber to 24 miles southeast of Livingston. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Torrential rainfall will cause a quick reduction in visibility, along with ponding of water on roadways, and quick water rises on streams and ditches. Locations impacted include... Big Timber, Harlowton, Ryegate, Deadmans Basin Reservoir, Absarokee, Judith Gap, Springdale, Franklin, Reed Point, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Shawmut, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge, Dean, Mc Leod, Melville, Greycliff, Nye, and Rapelje. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Musselshell; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
